enWisdom: The best intellect is [that which leads one to] right guidance
The best intelligence is keeping away from idle sport

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْعَقْلِ مَعْرِفَةُ الْإِنْسَانِ [الْمَرْءِ] نَفْسَهُ فَمَنْ عَرَفَ نَفْسَهُ عَقَلَ وَمَنْ جَهِلَهَا ضَلَّ
enWisdom: The best intelligence is for a person to know his self, for the one who knows his self becomes wise and the one who fails to know it goes astray

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْعَقْلِ الِاعْتِبَارُ وَأَفْضَلُ الْحَزْمِ الِاسْتِظْهَارُ وَأَكْبَرُ الْحُمْقِ الِاغْتِرَارُ
enWisdom: The best intelligence is taking lesson [from the past], the best prudence is precaution and the biggest foolishness is being deceived [by worldly allures]

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ النَّاسِ عَقْلًا أَحْسَنُهُمْ تَقْدِيراً لِمَعَاشِهِ وَأَشَدُّهُمْ اهْتِمَاماً بِإِصْلَاحِ مَعَادِهِ
enWisdom: The most intelligent of people is the best of them in estimating his livelihood and the most serious of them in endeavouring to improve his Hereafter
When the intellect becomes complete, lust diminishes
The completion of the intellect (or of action) is in its perfection
A strong intellect is the beauty of the outward and inward facets [of a human being]
A good intellect is the best pathfinder
One whose intellect is complete scorns lustful desires

Wisdom: مِنْ كَمَالِ عَقْلِكَ اسْتِظْهَارُكَ عَلَى عَقْلِكَ
enWisdom: From the perfection of your intellect is your reliance on your intellect
